Control Name: IA-4 (1) PROHIBIT ACCOUNT IDENTIFIERS AS PUBLIC IDENTIFIERS
Control Statement: The organization prohibits the use of information system account identifiers that are the same as public identifiers for individual electronic mail accounts.
